response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value to you, we believe it's worth more than what our competitors offer. After careful consideration, we propose a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This offer includes exclusive benefits such as a 1-year warranty and personalized support services. We are confident this product will significantly enhance your experience and productivity. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 14000}
